baRb 0.3.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    General purpose

    General workhorse functions for calling endpoints

    barb()
    Make a request to the barb API
    async_barb()
    Make a request to the barb async API

    Meta data endpoints

    Functions that expose the data from meta data endpoints

    meta_panels()
    Get the list of panels
    meta_stations()
    Get the list of stations
    meta_advertisers()
    Get the list of advertisers
    meta_buyers()
    Get the list of buyers
    meta_households()
    Get the list of panel households
    meta_panel_members()
    Get the list of panel members
    meta_target_audience_members()
    Get the list of target audience categories
    meta_viewing_stations()
    Get the list of viewing stations
    meta_spot_schedule()
    Get the spots scheduled
    meta_programme_schedule()
    Get the programmes scheduled
    meta_programme_content_details()
    Get the list of programme content details
    meta_transmission_log_programme_details()
    Get the list of transmission log programme details

    Async endpoints

    Functions related to calling the async API

    async_barb()
    Make a request to the barb async API
    async_sitrep()
    Check the status of async requests
    async_barb_result()
    Get/check status of result

    Authentication flow

    Setting up token authentication

    set_user()
    Set the user environment variable
    set_password()
    Set the password environment variable
    set_token()
    Set the default token

    Legacy

    Functions created by original author

    barb_add_female_audiences()
    Add missing audiences to a spot or programme impacts table
    barb_get_access_token()
    Get access token for barb API
    barb_get_advertisers()
    Get the list of available advertiser names
    barb_get_panels()
    Get the list of panels
    barb_get_programmes()
    Get a tibble of spots from the BARB API
    barb_get_spots()
    Get a tibble of spots from the BARB API
    barb_get_stations()
    Get a tibble of station names
    barb_query_api()
    Submit a query to the BARB API (usually not called directly)
    barb_rollup_spots()
    Roll up raw spot data by broadcast time for spot to web modelling

    On this page

    Developed by Neil Charles.
